posts.post_content:
Just back from SGC, two more cards that have been tucked away for three-plus decades in a collection of a longtime hobbyist.

T205 Speaker, Piedmont, SGC 50/4 (look at cards on VCP with the same grade from SGC, and you'll find this one compares very well. My guess is it didn't receive a higher grade because of a light stain in the upper-left corner. I'll take a stain on the back of a T205 rather than excessive chipping on the borders every time. Then again, I'm not a T205 "expert.") SOLD

T205 Lord, Hassan, SGC 60/5 SOLD

Prices are delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com [/URL]
